traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Locus of the Firemind: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.
traits.Magic Resistance: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Master Chemister: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

actions.Multiattack: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +17+1d16 + 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +17+1d16 + 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +17+1d16 + 9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Fire Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25+1d16 + 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

options.Cantrip: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.
options.Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions): Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a DC 25+1d16 + 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.
options.Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions): Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.
